Четко, внатуре чОтко. Особенно с последними обновами в соревах, когда выигрываешь 10 каток, и не повышают ранг, но проигрываешь одну и попадаешь в стан прекрасных сильверов. Плавление ануса вам обеспечено.

Honeslty this is one of the best games on the steam market place. Very competitive, and it features casual modes for the not so serious gamers out there. The only issue is, it's high popularity attracts cheaters to the game, but every few months or so a Vac wave is thrown out to introduce them to the ban hammer.

Counter Strike is a great game for players that like skill based games, with lots of  teamwork.
It´ll need lots of practice to climb the Cs Ladder, dont expect COD Gameplay.
You´ll need to learn the basics to get into it.

You've played CS before.  It's just as good as always with updated graphics and sound + new maps + new weapons.  There are also extra DLC campaigns that seem to be released every 6 months so it keeps the game interesting.  You have to pay $6 for these but it's basically like a very cheap expansion.  I believe there are 26 co-op and 30 online missions in the current Operation WildFire release.  

Laugh while 10 year olds fight each other on the mic or mute them and play for real.  The choice is up to you!  9/10
It is very fun and good.
